Lawrence H. Summers on Twitter

item.title: The "Banker to the World" is Back
item.description:
Americans have sold almost $1 trillion of low-yielding safe assets to foreigners in 2021 to finance purchases of corporate bonds, stocks, and direct investment abroad, as well as to finance the yawning U.S. trade deficit in manufactured goods. In effect‚Ä¶

URL: https://theovershoot.co/p/the-banker-to-the-world-is-back?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
